content: Well I just got a letter in the mail warning of big tax increases possibly in the future, Now this TAX increase is not for the ones over $250,000 it is for everyone else. He had it all planned out when during his campain he kept insisting he was not going to raise tax on us. What he is going to do is let the two Tax breaks Bush gave expire and not re-new them and that means bringing back the Death Tax also the total Tax increase is about $1700 per family average. Some pay more some less. Thats the way to go Dems. God Bless you if it happens you can take up a collections and pay ours. SEABEE'S "CAN DO", "HAVE DONE", AND WILL DO SO FOREVER. GOD BLESS AMERICA

content: According to the Heritage Foundation, the Waxman-Martley gullible warming bill would have the following impacts which are significant: - Reduce aggregate gross domestic product (GDP) by $7.4 trillion, - Destroy 844,000 jobs on average, with peak years seeing unemployment rise by over 1,900,000 jobs, - Raise electricity rates 90 percent after adjusting for inflation, - Raise inflation-adjusted gasoline prices by 74 percent, - Raise residential natural gas prices by 55 percent, - Raise an average family's annual energy bill by $1,500, and - Increase inflation-adjusted federal debt by 29 percent, or $33,400 additional federal debt per person, again after adjusting for inflation. "http://www.heritage.org/Research/EnergyandEnvironment/wm2438.cfm" "The World's Finest"

content: quote: "Under my plan of a cap and trade system, electricity rates would necessarily skyrocket. Because I'm capping greenhouse gases, coal power plants, you know, natural gas, you name it, whatever the plants were, whatever the industry was, uh, they would have to retrofit their operations. That will cost money. They will pass that money on to consumers." - Barak Obama "The World's Finest"
